Address: 45 MILES BETWEEN JUSTIN AND FRISCO, TEXAS
NAICS Translation: 237120: Oil and Gas Pipeline and Related Structures Construction
Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php

Description: The Georgia Public Service Commission unanimously accepted an amended stipulation with Atmos Energy to resolve issues involving the December 17, 2002 explosion in Gainesville, Georgia, which later resulted in the death of a citizen and serious injury to a second person. In the amended stipulation Atmos Energy agreed to pay a penalty of $285,000 in two parts: $195,000 to fund a statewide natural gas public safety education program in English and Spanish and a credit of $90,000 to the pipe replacement program.
